summary: A dentist's life turns into a roller coaster ride when he is unknowingly embroiled in gang wars.
cast: Akshay Kumar|Sunil Shetty|Aftab Shivdasani|Paresh Rawal|Preeti Jhangiani|Amrita Arora|Supriya Pilgaonkar|Aarti Chhabria|Johnny Lever|Rahul Dev|Om Puri|Asrani|George Moawad|Penni Tovey
title: Awara Paagal Deewana
